message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you be interested in making an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. How about $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $130?
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I still want to make a fair deal. How about $132?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. How about $128?
